instruction-for-use.navodila-za-uporabo: Dove Beauty Cream se najbolje uporablja po kopeli ali prhi, zjutraj ali ponoči (ali oboje). Bogato kremo velikodušno masirajte v kožo - posebno pozornost posvetite vsakemu suhem predelu, kot so pete, kolena in komolec.

ingredient-information.sestavine: Water/Aquasolvent, Palmitic Acidskin-identical ingredient, emollient, emulsifying0, 2, Stearic Acidemollient, viscosity controlling0, 2-3, Hydrogenated Starch Hydrolysatemoisturizer/-humectant, Mineral Oil/Paraffinum Liquidumemollient, solvent0, 0-2, Glyceryl Stearateemollient, emulsifying0, 1-2, Caprylic/Capric Triglycerideemollient, Dimethicone, Petrolatum.
